Text: If you don't mind me asking, why are you calling this SBFF #2?  What was #1?  I noticed the same thing with New Teen Titans #9 in the previous week's torrent.  What were the first 8?  The only ones I know of before the utility belt thing were Movie and Burping.  Thanks.
